cards.name: VictoriaHand
cards.description: Ongoing: Your cards created in your hand have +2 Power.

cards.name: KateBishop
cards.description: On Reveal: Add 2 Arrows to your hand.

cards.name: GrandMaster
cards.description: On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.

cards.name: Bullseye
cards.description: Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.

cards.name: Nocturne
cards.description: You can move this once. When this moves, replace its location with a random new one.

cards.name: BlackSwan
cards.description: Activate: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

cards.name: Moonstone
cards.description: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of your 1, 2, and 3-Cost cards here.

cards.name: MarvelBoy
cards.description: After each turn, give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

cards.name: Caiera
cards.description: Ongoing: Your 1 and 6-Cost cards can't be destroyed.

cards.name: Ares

cards.name: Misery
